message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. I believe this product will greatly benefit you and provide significant value at this price point.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the introductory price, but I'm looking to get a better deal.  I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to negotiate further. In light of this, I would like to offer the product to you for $11,500. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're looking for.
